DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the effects of ISIS ISIS-APOCIIIRX on Triglyceride Levels and Insulin Sensitivity in Subjects with Type 2 Diabetes on stable treatment with metformin.
DOC.brief_title: Mechanistic Study of ISIS ISIS-APOCIIIRX in Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.criteria: BMI >/= 25 to </= 40 kg/m2 Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus and on a stable dose of metformin Hypertriglyceridemia Significant abnormalities in medical history, clinical examination or clinical testing Use of oral antidiabetic medication other than metformin within 3 months prior to dosing History of outpatient insulin use for more than 2 weeks in the last year
